education.title: Understanding Fixed Deposits
education.description: A fixed deposit (FD) is a financial instrument that provides a higher rate of return compared to regular savings accounts, until the given maturity date.
benefitsList: Guaranteed returns with fixed interest rates
Safe investment option with low risk
compoundingList: Daily: Interest compounded every day (365 times/year)
Monthly: Interest compounded every month (12 times/year)
Quarterly: Interest compounded every quarter (4 times/year)
Annually: Interest compounded once per year

education.title: Retirement Planning Tips
education.description: Retirement planning is crucial for financial security. The earlier you start, the more time your money has to grow through compound interest.
strategiesList: Start Early: Even small amounts can grow significantly over time
Automate Savings: Set up automatic transfers to retirement accounts
Diversify Investments: Don't put all eggs in one basket
Take Advantage of Employer Match: Free money from 401(k) matching
rulesList: Save 10-15% of your income for retirement
Aim to replace 70-90% of pre-retirement income
Consider inflation in your planning (3% annually)
Review and adjust your plan annually

about.title: About Finance Learning Hub
about.description: Empowering individuals with the knowledge and tools they need to make informed financial decisions and build a secure financial future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Financial literacy is a crucial life skill that everyone deserves to have. Our mission is to make financial education accessible, practical, and engaging for people at all stages of their financial journey. We believe that with the right tools and knowledge, anyone can take control of their finances and build wealth for the future.
mission.paragraph2: Through interactive calculators, educational content, and practical guidance, we aim to demystify personal finance and help you make confident financial decisions that align with your goals and values.

whatWeOffer.title: Interactive Calculators
whatWeOffer.description: Powerful, easy-to-use calculators for fixed deposits, emergency funds, and annual savings planning. Get instant results with detailed breakdowns and explanations.

whatWeOffer.title: Educational Content
whatWeOffer.description: Comprehensive guides and articles that explain financial concepts in simple terms. Learn at your own pace with practical examples and real-world applications.

whatWeOffer.title: Expert Guidance
whatWeOffer.description: Best practices and strategies developed by financial experts. Get actionable advice that you can implement immediately to improve your financial situation.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Finance Learning Hub was created out of a simple observation: too many people struggle with basic financial concepts not because they lack intelligence, but because they lack access to clear, practical financial education.
ourStory.paragraph2: We noticed that traditional financial education often involves complex jargon, intimidating concepts, and theoretical knowledge that doesn't translate well to real-world situations. We wanted to change that.
ourStory.paragraph3: Our platform combines interactive tools with educational content to create a learning experience that is both practical and engaging. Whether you're just starting your financial journey or looking to optimize your existing financial strategy, we're here to help you succeed.

valuesList.title: Accessibility
